data.oai_dc:dc: Appendix 1: Lineage counts sampling strategy implemented in SimPhy
Supplementary text describing the novel strategy used by SimPhy to sample lineage counts during the simulation of gene trees under the multilocus coalescent model.

simulation|incomplete lineage sorting|gene duplication and loss|horizontal gene transfer|gene conversion|species tree|locus tree|gene family evolution|multispecies coalescent|multilocus coalescent|substitution rate
